value.title: Maintain Layer Order for your Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can maintain layer order in Power BI. value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together
value.excerpt: With the release of Microsoft SQL Server 2016, I look at how Reporting Services and Power BI work together.
